pages.text: Subtitle: Vegan's Horror $(br2)Warning: This mod may contain scenes that are not suitable for vegetarians! $(br2)Butcher's Delight adds a range of new tools and recipes to Minecraft, letting you master the art of butchery and prepare delicious dishes.

Getting food and other resources from animals takes a bit of extra work. When you kill a cow, sheep, chicken, pig, llama, or rabbit, you don't get their normal drops. You get a carcass that you then need to process! $(br2)Once you have a carcass, you can put it straight onto a Roaster placed over a campfire.

Or you can process the carcass on the ground to get skin or fur plus meat. $(br2)Put the carcass on a meathook for more efficient processing! $(br2)The skin and fur can be processed on a rack with shears.
With Butcher's Delight, you'll become a culinary master with an array of delicious dishes that will satisfy even the most discerning meat lover.
